description: Submission of reserved matters relating to scale, layout, access, external appearance and landscaping for Development Plot H (Multi-Storey Car Park Site) comprising the erection of a part 4, part 5 and part 9 storey building and a 9 storey building to provide 142 residential units and up to 860 sqm of flexible commercial floorspace (GEA) at ground floor level (Use Classes A1, A3, A4 or B1) including provision of balconies and roof terraces, the reinstatement of McFarlane Place, car parking, cycle storage and refuse storage, installation of M&E plant and photo-voltaic panels at roof level and associated landscaping pursuant to planning permission 2016/01373/VAR (granted 6th September 2016) in accordance with Condition 1(ii)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
